otherNames: Puchimas!: Petit iDOLM@STER - Takatsuki Gold Densetsu Special!! Haruka-san Matsuri, ぷちます！－プチ・アイドルマスター－　高槻ゴールド伝説すぺしゃる！！はるかさん祭り
synopsis: The overly active daily life of 765Pro's idols, The Idolmasters, becomes even more frantic when the overly cute beings called Puchidolls — somewhat resembling their idols in looks and in character — show up one by one at the studio.
